「あおり」デマ書き込み、豊田市議が辞職

02 Nov 2019, 14:21

　茨城県の常磐道で８月、あおり運転をした上、男性を殴ったとして男が逮捕された事件に絡み、無関係の女性を男の同乗者とするデマ情報を自身のフェイスブックに書き込んだ愛知県豊田市議の原田隆司氏（５７）が２日、議員の辞職願を杉浦弘高・同市議会議長に提出した。杉浦議長はこれを受理、同日付で許可した。
　読売新聞の取材に対し、原田氏は「このまま議員活動を続ければ、市民や市議会に多大な迷惑をかけると判断し、一日も早く身を引くことにした」と述べた。
　原田氏は現在２期目。同市では来年２月に市長選挙が予定されており、辞職に伴う市議補選が行われる見通し。
text:
"Aori" hoax writing, Toyota City Council resigns

02 Nov 2019, 14:21

In Aichi, Ibaraki Prefecture, in August, after driving on the road, involved a case in which a man was arrested for hitting a man, and wrote a hoax information about an unrelated woman as a male passenger on his Facebook Takashi Harada (57) of Toyota City Council, Toyota Prefecture, submitted an application for resignation of members to Hirotaka Sugiura and the city council chairman on the 2nd. Mr. Sugiura accepted this and approved it on the same date.
Mr. Harada told the Yomiuri Shimbun, “I decided that if I continued my parliamentary activities, it would cause great inconvenience to the citizens and the city council, and I decided to withdraw as soon as possible.”
Mr. Harada is currently in his second term. In the city, a mayoral election is scheduled for February next year.
